alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 17 at 11:14PM PDT until June 18 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 11 PM PDT SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wind Advisory on Saturday, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...Wind Advisory on Saturday, from 10 AM to 11 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...For the rest of tonight, winds are subsiding this evening. While some gusts are likely overnight, especially over higher terrain, widespread windy conditions are no longer expected. For Saturday, high winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
